LanguageData.Sandbags.label: sacos de areia
LanguageData.Sandbags_Blueprint.label: sacos de areia (projeto)
LanguageData.Sandbags_Frame.label: sacos de areia (construção)
LanguageData.Turret_MiniTurret.label: mini-turret
LanguageData.Turret_MiniTurret.description: A small, short-ranged automatic turret. Requires steel to replace its barrel after heavy use. May explode when damaged. Its dumb AI brain can't be directly controlled, so beware of friendly fire.
LanguageData.Turret_MiniTurret_Blueprint.label: mini-turret (blueprint)
LanguageData.Turret_MiniTurret_Frame.label: mini-turret (building)
LanguageData.Turret_MiniTurret_Frame.description: A small, short-ranged automatic turret. Requires steel to replace its barrel after heavy use. May explode when damaged. Its dumb AI brain can't be directly controlled, so beware of friendly fire.
LanguageData.Bullet_MiniTurret.label: mini-turret bullet
LanguageData.Gun_MiniTurret.label: mini-turret gun
LanguageData.Gun_MiniTurret.description: A simple automatic gun made to be mounted on a turret.
LanguageData.Turret_Autocannon.label: autocannon turret
LanguageData.Turret_Autocannon.description: A long-ranged heavy automatic turret. Its large-caliber shells do heavy damage over long ranges, but it requires frequent and expensive barrel changes. It cannot fire at close-up targets, and may explode when damaged.
LanguageData.Turret_Autocannon_Blueprint.label: autocannon turret (blueprint)
LanguageData.Turret_Autocannon_Frame.label: autocannon turret (building)
LanguageData.Turret_Autocannon_Frame.description: A long-ranged heavy automatic turret. Its large-caliber shells do heavy damage over long ranges, but it requires frequent and expensive barrel changes. It cannot fire at close-up targets, and may explode when damaged.
LanguageData.Bullet_AutocannonTurret.label: autocannon shell
LanguageData.Gun_AutocannonTurret.label: autocannon
LanguageData.Gun_AutocannonTurret.description: A self-loading large-bore cannon designed to attach to a turret.
LanguageData.Turret_Mortar.label: mortar
LanguageData.Turret_Mortar.description: A manned mortar that launches all kinds of shells. While it can inflict devastating damage, the mortar's inherent inaccuracy makes it more useful for attacking large fortifications than groups of enemies in the field.
LanguageData.Turret_Mortar_Blueprint.label: mortar (blueprint)
LanguageData.Turret_Mortar_Blueprint_Install.label: mortar (blueprint)
LanguageData.Turret_Mortar_Frame.label: mortar (building)
LanguageData.Turret_Mortar_Frame.description: A manned mortar that launches all kinds of shells. While it can inflict devastating damage, the mortar's inherent inaccuracy makes it more useful for attacking large fortifications than groups of enemies in the field.
LanguageData.Artillery_Mortar.label: mortar
LanguageData.Artillery_Mortar.description: Mortar launcher. Lobs bombs over walls. Very inaccurate but long-ranged.
LanguageData.TrapDeadfall.label: armadilha suspensa
LanguageData.TrapDeadfall.description: Um espinho pesado suspenso sustentado por um gatilho delicado. Quando a vítima perturba no gatilho, o peso é libertado e cai sobre sua cabeça ou torso.
LanguageData.TrapDeadfall_Blueprint.label: armadilha suspensa (projeto)
LanguageData.TrapDeadfall_Frame.label: armadilha suspensa (construção)
LanguageData.TrapDeadfall_Frame.description: Um espinho pesado suspenso sustentado por um gatilho delicado. Quando a vítima perturba no gatilho, o peso é libertado e cai sobre sua cabeça ou torso.
LanguageData.TrapIED_HighExplosive.label: IED trap
LanguageData.TrapIED_HighExplosive.description: A mortar shell connected to a homemade trigger. When someone disturbs the trigger, the shell explodes. The improvised trigger has a random delay that might allow a nimble enemy to escape.
LanguageData.TrapIED_HighExplosive_Blueprint.label: IED trap (blueprint)
LanguageData.TrapIED_HighExplosive_Frame.label: IED trap (building)
LanguageData.TrapIED_HighExplosive_Frame.description: A mortar shell connected to a homemade trigger. When someone disturbs the trigger, the shell explodes. The improvised trigger has a random delay that might allow a nimble enemy to escape.
LanguageData.TrapIED_Incendiary.label: IED incendiary trap
LanguageData.TrapIED_Incendiary.description: Explosives mixed into an incendiary paste with a chemical trigger for dispersal. Its chemical trigger is simple and reliable.
LanguageData.TrapIED_Incendiary_Blueprint.label: IED incendiary trap (blueprint)
LanguageData.TrapIED_Incendiary_Frame.label: IED incendiary trap (building)
LanguageData.TrapIED_Incendiary_Frame.description: Explosives mixed into an incendiary paste with a chemical trigger for dispersal. Its chemical trigger is simple and reliable.
LanguageData.TrapIED_EMP.label: IED EMP trap
LanguageData.TrapIED_EMP.description: A simple trap consisting of an EMP shell and a homemade trigger. The explosion can paralyze mechanoids for a few seconds. Can be triggered even by those who are unaffected by EMP explosions.
LanguageData.TrapIED_EMP_Blueprint.label: IED EMP trap (blueprint)
LanguageData.TrapIED_EMP_Frame.label: IED EMP trap (building)
LanguageData.TrapIED_EMP_Frame.description: A simple trap consisting of an EMP shell and a homemade trigger. The explosion can paralyze mechanoids for a few seconds. Can be triggered even by those who are unaffected by EMP explosions.
LanguageData.TrapIED_Firefoam.label: IED firefoam trap
LanguageData.TrapIED_Firefoam.description: When someone touches the trigger, the trap explodes and sprays a fire-extinguishing foam around itself.
LanguageData.TrapIED_Firefoam_Blueprint.label: IED firefoam trap (blueprint)
LanguageData.TrapIED_Firefoam_Frame.label: IED firefoam trap (building)
LanguageData.TrapIED_Firefoam_Frame.description: When someone touches the trigger, the trap explodes and sprays a fire-extinguishing foam around itself.
LanguageData.TrapIED_AntigrainWarhead.label: IED antigrain warhead trap
LanguageData.TrapIED_AntigrainWarhead.description: A high-tech antigraing warhead connected to a homemade trigger. When triggered, the antigrain warhead detonates, creating a massive antimatter explosion.
LanguageData.TrapIED_AntigrainWarhead_Blueprint.label: IED antigrain warhead trap (blueprint)
LanguageData.TrapIED_AntigrainWarhead_Frame.label: IED antigrain warhead trap (building)
LanguageData.TrapIED_AntigrainWarhead_Frame.descripti: A high-tech antigraing warhead connected to a homemade trigger. When triggered, the antigrain warhead detonates, creating a massive antimatter explosion.
